name: Runbow Deluxe Edition
overview: Runbow is a fast, frantic game that you can play with up to 9 people on the same console, or online with friends all around the world. Conquer over 140 levels in the single player Adventure, or go head to head in one of Runbow's four multiplayer modes. The world changes with each swipe of color, so you'll have to stay on your toes as platforms and obstacles disappear! Runbow: Deluxe Edition includes - The original Game, Satura's Space Adventure, All DLC add-on packs, and the Runbow OST Volumes 1 & 2.
